transcript: behind Kutuzov was heard the sound of regiments saluting, and this sound rap idly came nearer along the whole extended line of the advancing Russian col- umns. Evidently the person they were greeting was riding quickly. When the soldiers of the regiment in front of which Kutuzov was stand- ing began to shout, he rode a little to one side and looked round with a frown. Along the road from Pratzen galloped what looked like a squadron of horsemen in various uniforms. Two of them rode side
